name: solita-dev-academy-2021-heroku-app
description: Heroku app (backend and frontend) for Solita Dev Academy 2021 exercise

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../solita-dev-academy-2021-exercise && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../solita-dev-academy-2021-heroku-app
